resources.string: This application contributes to development of cognitive functions, such as memory, attention, reaction efficiency, and also to higher stress resistance and effective decision-making
The skills development is assured through the generation of commands base/system for target layout and environment used within training process

During the operation the application randomly choose any task of accessible types. The tasks can include pictures, text and audio commands. In “Settings” the user can choose tasks types used while application operation
For higher commands effectiveness you can ask your coach or partner to compose tasks so that you don’t become acquainted with them in advance as likely as you composed them yourself
Task. Time to task performance. It is recommended to set the maximum time according to the longest performed task
Memory. Time to store task. Off at audio-commands operation
Cycle.On – continuous tasks opening. Off – single task opening
Folders with tasks. Tasks must be divided by types in related folders: pictures, audio, text. Choose a polling authorization for each folder and also set a timer sound before or after the task replay

The tasks diversity depends on target types, environment and user’s imagination. A task may include not only firing exercises of different degree of complexity, but physical exercises and their combinations. A part of tasks can be formed as pictorial puzzles for development of the mental agility

"In visual tasks you can place different colors with a corresponding command for each color (for example, shooting on multicolor toy balloons). Or you can place colored symbols, numbers, forms in the task for memorizing and shooting on a target with a similar position (see picture 1)"
"For the target on Picture 1 you can formulate text, voice and pictures tasks: "

string.name: example_34
string.b: 4. Green triangle, blue triangle, white square, 4

string.name: example_36
string.b: 6. Yellow (shooting on all yellow targets), at 12 (that means target at the 12 o’clock position – a green square), stop (association with a red traffic light)

resources.string: This target is more suitable for pistol shooting. The disposition on the training area of figure and half-silhouette targets at different distances and positions let compose different tasks (for example, with pictures)
Fire transfer at different distances and assignment of shots number

string.name: sound_11
string.b: 1. Target at one o’clock position to 100

string.name: sound_12
string.b: 2. Target at twelve o’clock position to 300

string.name: sound_14
string.b: 4. Target at 400. Five in lying position

string.name: sound_15
string.b: 5. Target at 200. The third at left\\

resources.string: The sound tasks can be abbreviated. Examples of changed commands above:

string.name: text_1
string.b: 1. Target at 300. Five in lying position (five shots in lying position in the target at 300 m.) If there are several targets at 300 m, the tasks can be composed as follows: target at 300 at 11 o’clock position (300 m at 11 o’clock position). Target at 300 m the second at right, etc

string.name: text_4
string.b: 4. Target at 100. 10 in the upright position

string.name: text_5
string.b: 5. Target at 200. 5 from a kneeling position

resources.string: The application setup completed, please check the availability of the following folders:

The folders for tasks are created on SD-card or the internal storage/ It depends on the version of Android security policy. If there are no abovementioned folders, the user creates them himself on the accessible storage. That done, the user composes tasks and places them in respective folders
For different training grounds and environment it is recommended to create separated folders with specified tasks.
Audio tasks – mp3, wav, ogg, m4a
